"A.P.238/4/9 12:00": "Hmmm! There might actually be some strong bad guys from here on out."

"But still, if they run into Team Lisa and you, we'll just defeat them and
this'll be done in no time, won't it?"
"Speaking of which, yeah! Speaking of which, Lisa had a question to ask you, and she still does!"
"Oh, put your guard down. It's just a silly question."
"Why did you decide to get so strong?"
"For yourself? For someone else? Maybe for revenge? Or is it something else?"
"Well, honestly, it doesn't matter. That's hardly why Lisa is even asking."
"You see, Lisa is usually really good at reading people, but you're hard to read."
"Even after looking at you all this time, Lisa still doesn't understand your motivation."
"But Lisa is fine with not knowing. If Lisa doesn't know, she'll just keep staring at you until she does."
"Ah, Lisa doesn't want you to tell her. You'd become boring if you did."
"Lisa wants to keep enjoying this fuzzy feeling in her head."
"Anyways, in the time we took to have this chat, the other teams have probably caught up. Now it's exciting again."
"Team Lisa and <%me> will still win anyways, though. Hehe. Hehehe!"
